data.name: CertifyManager_AutomateConfigurationCheckFailed_HTTP
data.value: Automated configuration checks failed. Authorizations will not be able to complete. Check you have http bindings for your site and ensure you can browse to http://{0}/.well-known/acme-challenge/configcheck before proceeding.

data.name: CertifyManager_AutomateConfigurationCheckFailed_SNI
data.value: Automated configuration checks failed. Authorizations will not be able to complete. Check you have https SNI bindings for your site (ex: '0123456789ABCDEF0123456789ABCDEF.0123456789ABCDEF0123456789ABCDEF.acme.invalid') before proceeding.

data.value: Site stopped (or not present), renewal skipped as domain validation cannot be performed.

data.value: Beginning certificate order for requested domains
